name: desk-ui
description: HTML front-end for visualization (3D objects and medical images)
author: Sebastien Valette <sebastien.valette@creatis.insa-lyon.fr> (http://www.creatis.insa-lyon.fr/~valette)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run buildDirty
scripts.buildDirty: npm run fixCss && npm run buildWorkers && npm run qooxdoo
scripts.compile: qx compile --target source && qx compile --target build
scripts.fixCss: npm run fixBillboard && npm run fixXterm
scripts.qooxdoo: qx pkg update && qx pkg install && qx pkg upgrade && npm run compile && npm run deploy
scripts.updateAll: rm -rf node_modules && git pull && npm install && npm run build
